title: Textile, 1801–25
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 91.3 x 44 cm (35 15/16 x 17 5/16 in.)
Repeat H: 24 cm (9 7/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment
description: Fragment of pattern with offset arrangement of oval medallions containing scenes of courtship and marriage purple super-imposed on a floral vine pattern on a purple background.
